content.4: Since thou wast precious in my sight, thou hast been honourable, and I have loved thee: therefore will I give men for thee, and people for thy life.
content.6: I will say to the north, Give up; and to the south, Keep not back: bring my sons from far, and my daughters from the ends of the earth;
content.8: Bring forth the blind people that have eyes, and the deaf that have ears.
content.9: Let all the nations be gathered together, and let the people be assembled: who among them can declare this, and shew us former things? let them bring forth their witnesses, that they may be justified: or let them hear, and say,
content.12: I have declared, and have saved, and I have shewed, when
content.17: Which bringeth forth the chariot and horse, the army and the power; they shall lie down together, they shall not rise: they are extinct, they are quenched as tow.
content.18: Remember ye not the former things, neither consider the things of old.
content.19: Behold, I will do a new thing; now it shall spring forth; shall ye not know it? I will even make a way in the wilderness,
content.20: The beast of the field shall honour me, the dragons and the owls: because I give waters in the wilderness,
content.21: This people have I formed for myself; they shall shew forth my praise.
content.22: But thou hast not called upon me, O Jacob; but thou hast been weary of me, O Israel.
content.23: Thou hast not brought me the small cattle of thy burnt offerings; neither hast thou honoured me with thy sacrifices. I have not caused thee to serve with an offering, nor wearied thee with incense.
content.24: Thou hast bought me no sweet cane with money, neither hast thou filled me with the fat of thy sacrifices: but thou hast made me to serve with thy sins, thou hast wearied me with thine iniquities.
content.26: Put me in remembrance: let us plead together: declare thou, that thou mayest be justified.
content.27: Thy first father hath sinned, and thy teachers have transgressed against me.
content.28: Therefore I have profaned the princes of the sanctuary, and have given Jacob to the curse, and Israel to reproaches.
